alert.note: Alert for Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 12:56PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Logan, south central Johnson, eastern Scott and northwestern Yell Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Paris to Stonehouse Recreation Area. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris... Danville... Lamar... Magazine... Knoxville... Subiaco... Scranton... Blue Mountain... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Mount Magazine... Midway in Logan County... Tokalon... Plainview in Yell County... Lake Dardanelle... Belleville... Havana... Corinth... Ranger... Dublin... Ludwig... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 64 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
